SELECT a.lg_num, a.m_num, a.m_name, m_phone, b.hr_level FROM (SELECT lgj.lg_num, m.m_num, m.m_name, REGEXP_REPLACE(m.m_phone, '(.{3})(.+)(.{4})', '\1-\2-\3') m_phone FROM lg_join lgj, member m WHERE lgj.m_num = m.m_num AND lg_num = #{lg_num}) a,
(SELECT hr.m_num, MAX(HR_LEVEL) hr_level FROM lg_join lgj, hw_record hr WHERE lgj.m_num = hr.m_num AND lgj.lg_num = #{lg_num} GROUP BY hr.m_num ) b WHERE a.m_num = b.m_num

SELECT a.lg_num, a.m_num, a.m_name, m_phone, b.hr_level, c.existence FROM (SELECT lgj.lg_num, m.m_num, m.m_name, REGEXP_REPLACE(m.m_phone, '(.{3})(.+)(.{4})', '\1-\2-\3') m_phone FROM lg_join lgj, member m WHERE lgj.m_num = m.m_num AND lg_num = #{lg_num}) a,
(SELECT hr.m_num, MAX(HR_LEVEL) hr_level FROM lg_join lgj, hw_record hr WHERE lgj.m_num = hr.m_num AND lgj.lg_num = #{lg_num} GROUP BY hr.m_num ) b,
(SELECT c1.m_num, NVL(c2.existence, 0) existence FROM (SELECT m_num FROM lg_join WHERE lg_num = #{lg_num}) c1, (SELECT m_num, 1 existence FROM hw_send WHERE h_num = #{h_num}) c2 WHERE c1.m_num = c2.m_num(+)) c WHERE a.m_num = b.m_num AND a.m_num = c.m_num
